news_header: High bankruptcy applications in Finland, with 128 in one week, marking the highest in the 2020s.
news_original_title: Vuoden alussa tehty poikkeuksellisen paljon konkurssihakemuksia
news_text: In early 2024, Finland saw an exceptional rise in bankruptcy applications, with 128 filed in one week, the highest weekly figure of the 2020s. Overall, 3006 enterprises declared bankruptcy in 2024, the largest number in the 2000s, primarily affecting small firms.
